campaignDescription: A group of adventurers must uncover the secrets of an ancient dwarven artifact to prevent catastrophic elemental chaos.

currentConflicts: Tension between surface dwellers and dwarven clans

mainPlot.mainObjective: Prevent the Ember Enclave from misusing the Elemental Forge
mainPlot.antagonist: Rurik Emberstone, leader of the Ember Enclave

plotStages.stageDescription: Players arrive in Ember Hollow and learn about the recent disturbances.
Explore the abandoned mines and discover the Ember Enclave's presence.
Enter the ancient dwarven stronghold and learn about the Elemental Forge.

factions.factionDescription: A secretive group of dwarven smiths seeking to harness elemental powers.
The ruling dwarven clan of the region, concerned about the Enclave's activities.

worldMap.regionDescription: A small mining village nestled at the foot of the Ashen Peaks.

levels.name: Surface
levels.description: The surface level of Ember Hollow, including the village and surrounding areas.

levels.name: Old Mines of Ember Hollow
levels.description: Abandoned mines now being explored by the party.

worldMap.regionDescription: A long-abandoned dwarven complex hidden beneath the mountains.

levels.name: Stronghold Entrance
levels.description: The upper level of the stronghold, containing the main entrance and defensive structures.

levels.name: Dwarven Complex - First Floor
levels.description: The main level of the stronghold, containing various important chambers.

levels.name: Forge Level
levels.description: The lower level of the stronghold, housing the Elemental Forge and related chambers.

timelineEvents.eventDescription: A strong earthquake shakes Ember Hollow, signaling the awakening of the Elemental Forge.
timelineEvents.impact: Increases urgency, damages some buildings in the village

timelineEvents.eventDescription: The Ember Enclave receives reinforcements, increasing their presence in the mines.
timelineEvents.triggerCondition: Players discover the Enclave's presence in the mines
timelineEvents.impact: Increases difficulty of encounters in the mines, adds time pressure

timelineEvents.eventDescription: Elemental creatures begin appearing in the region due to the Forge's growing instability.
timelineEvents.impact: Adds elemental encounters in the overworld, increases the stakes of the mission
